DOC.brief_summary: A novel gonadotropin protocol ovarian stimulation add low-dose hCG ( 50- 200 IU ) source LH ( luteinizing hormone ) late follicular phase . This regimen reduce number small pre-ovulatory follicle could reduce risk OHSS ( ovarian hyper stimulation syndrome ) . Adequate ovarian hormonal level , oocyte maturation , avoidance premature LH surge , increased pregnancy rate benefit regimen . HCG might also affect endometrial function , stimulate endometrial growth maturation enhance endometrial angiogenesis . These effect could extend angiogenesis . These result could lengthen implantation Window . Inhibin A heterodimer protein begin increase increase oestradiol late follicular phase , suggest secretion dominant follicle . Inhibin A secretion regulate LH associated paracrine/autocrine action oocyte maturation . Moreover , related follicular development size , serve marker follicular maturation IVF cycle .However , role hCG supplementation COH ( control ovarian hyperstimulation ) still matter debate study need . Thus , objective trial investigate whether LH activity form low dose hCG GnRH ( Gonadotropin release hormone ) antagonist cycle would improve quality oocyte , level inhibin A endometrial vascularity .
DOC.detailed_description: - 60 woman , 30 receive low dose HCG rFSH ( group 1 ) , 30 woman receive rFSH ( Recombinant Follicle stimulate Hormone ) placebo ( group 2 ) use antagonist protocol method induction ICSI . - Women group treat GnRH antagonist protocol cetrotide ( cetrorelix ) - In Group 1 , low dose hCG ( 200 IU per day ) rFSH give daily least six follicle 12 mm observe E2 level higher 600 ng/l , day hCG trigger administration . - Group 2 patient receive rFSH injection placebo start cycle day 3 stimulation cycle day hCG trigger administration . In group Oocytes retrieve 36 h hCG trigger shot . All mature egg retrieve fertilized intracytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) . Fertilization check 18 hour post insemination . Embryo quality assess embryo transfer occur day 3 .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Indication ICSI treatment . 2 . The presence one two functional ovary . 3 . Good responder ovarian stimulation . 4 . The presence normal uterine cavity 5 . Basal ( day 2 3 ) serum FSH ( follicle stimulate Hormone ) level ≤13 IU 6 . No untreated endocrinologic disease 1 . Abnormal uterine cavity . 2 . Basal ( day 2 3 ) serum FSH level ≥13 IU . 3 .
